name: ext_R5_RequestOrchestration_ac_co_expression
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RequestOrchestration.action.condition.expression for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestOrchestration.action.condition.expression from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: An expression that returns true or false, indicating whether or not the condition is satisfied.
element.comment: `RequestGroup.action.condition.expression` maps to R3 `RequestGroup.action.condition.description`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `RequestGroup.action.condition.expression` maps to R3 `RequestGroup.action.condition.language`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `RequestGroup.action.condition.expression` maps to R3 `RequestGroup.action.condition.expression`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
